Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Specifies that low-income housing tax credits may be issued both for projects creating new housing and projects renovating and preserving existing housing
Summary: Specifies that low-income housing tax credits may be issued both for projects creating new housing and projects renovating and preserving existing housing, nullifying a DHCR determination that projects for the renovation and preservation of existing housing do not qualify.
LawCode: Amd ยง21, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to specifying that low-income housing tax credits may be issued both for projects creating new housing and projects renovating and preserving existing housing
